Title: A Better Tomorrow
Writer: Hing-Ka Chan, Suk-Wah Leung, John Woo
Actors: Lung Ti, Yun-Fat Chow, Leslie Cheung, Emily Chu
Plot: This story is the tale of two brothers: one a successful counterfeiter and the younger a fledgling graduate of the HK police academy. The plot revolves around the split when the younger brother learns the other is a criminal and the efforts of the criminal brother to reform. Along the way are plenty of heists, double-crosses, and shoot outs.
